featuredImage.title: Create: Chantown Creative
featuredImage.alt: Picture of a horse with inks by Chantown Creative

h1: "Creating is what I like best, and what I like best, is to create."
leader: Vickie Chan, Director of Chantown Creative, is an artist and illustrator. In fact, her creative insight is part of what gives us such a rounded and well-thought overview when it comes to our clients creative communications projects.
content:
You can also learn some life hacks from her series, Surviving Hong Kong, where Chan explains and complains, one drawing at a time. Find it on Tumblr and Instagram.

To view personal and commercial works, simply click on one of the gallery filters below. Some works are available for purchase.
